CustomField.formula: (GrossIncome__c - BasicSalary__c *(HealthInsurancePercentage__c + UnemploymentInsurancePercentage__c + Social_Insurance_Percentage__c ) - PITAmount__c) - SalaryAdvanceAmount__c + SalaryTaxfreeWorkDay__c + SalaryTaxfreeOTHour__c + TaxfreeAllowance__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Net Income = Income After Tax + Salary by Tax-free OT (Hour) + Salary by Tax-free Work Day + Apprenticeship Allowance Amount + Tax-free Allowance - Salary Advance Amount
CustomField.label: Net Income
